product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag - Large
long_description: Bring it all, except the sink, with this large Sea to Summit Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag, which is made of light, water-resistant materials and offers lots of internal organization. Constructed out of lightweight and water-resistant Ultra-Sil(TM) fabric made with Cordura(R) nylon yarn for durability. Clamshell-shaped lid zips open to provide full access to contents, with hanging hook conveniently placed at top. Interior features 2 zippered mesh pockets and 2 large mesh slip pockets for easy viewing of contents and simple organization.
short_description: Bring it all, except the sink, with this large Sea to Summit Travelling Light Hanging Toiletry Bag, which is made of light, water-resistant materials and offers lots of internal organization.
